data.title: DJ Ashba bio: age, wikipedia, family, height, net worth
data.meta_description: DJ Ashba bio: age, wikipedia, family, height, net worth. DJ Ashba is an American musician, songwriter, and producer best known for his work with hard rock
data.text:
DJ Ashba is an American musician, songwriter, and producer best known for his work with hard rock bands such as Beautiful Creatures, BulletBoys, and Guns N’ Roses. This musician is the current lead guitarist for Sixx: A.M.

DJ Ashba: Profile summary

DJ Ashba: Biography and Early Life

DJ Ashba was born as Daren Jay Ashba on the 10th of November 1972, in Monticello, Indiana, in the United States of America. He was raised in Fairbury, Illinois by his parents, whose names we don’t know. His mother was a classically trained pianist who began teaching him about music when he was a toddler. His first piano recital was at the age of five where he played, Ode to Joy.

At six years old, he made a drum kit out of garbage cans, pots, and pans and got a real set later on. At age eight, he worked on a farm to save money for a guitar and was taught how to play the guitar by a man he met on the bus when he was going to the farm. When he was 16, his father took him to the Mötley Crüe’s Girls, Girls, Girls Tour, and that was the night he decided he was going to be a performer. When he was 18, he moved to Hollywood to begin his career.

DJ Ashba: Age, Height, Weight & Body Measurement

So, how old is DJ Ashba in 2022, and what is his height and weight? Well, DJ Ashba’s age is 49 years old as of today’s date 12th May 2022 having been born on 10 November 1972. Though, he is 5′ 7″ in feet and inches and 175 cm in Centimetres tall, he weighs about 119 lbs in Pound and 54 kg in Kilograms.

DJ Ashba: Career

DJ Ashba started off his career by joining the group named Barracuda and traveled with the band for a period of two years. In the year 1996, he has launched his debut instrumental album entitled Addiction to the Friction.

In the year 1998, he has associated with BulletBoys as a member of the new line-up of the band. During that time, he encountered Joe Lesté of Bang Tango. In the year 1999, he has defunct the group to begin a new band with Lesté.

In the year 1999, Ashba started patching together the band, which will transform Beautiful Creatures with Bang Tango based frontman named Joe Lesté. The team then added prior Shake The Faith as well as No. 9 bassist named Kenny Kweens and also a session drummer named Anthony Foxx.

He has created a new solo band, entitled ASHBA after his parting from Beautiful Creatures wherein he has added a previous Tuff guitarist named Michael Thomas, the one who was Ashba’s standby in BC. However, he abandoned that group in the year 2003.

It is found that a bassist named John Younger and drummer named Blas Elias round out the group’s line-up.

Ashba has issued a critically commended album entitled The Heroin Diaries Soundtrack after associating with Mötley Crüe based bassist named Nikki Sixx as well as a producer named James Michael below the name, i.e. Sixx: A.M.

DJ Ashba: Dating, Girlfriends, Wife, Kids

In 2013, Ashba took his girlfriend on a ride in a police helicopter in Las Vegas. He was able to pull this off with the help of three Las Vegas police officers. On this helicopter ride, Ashba proposed to his girlfriend, Nathalia Henao, and they got married on the 23rd of September 2013. The couple does not have any children yet.

DJ Ashba: Net worth

DJ Ashba has an estimated net worth of $15 Million as of April 2022. He makes his fortune from being a musician, songwriter, and producer.
